name: The Tapes Whisper
description:
You awake next to a tape player.

Your surrounding are unfamiliar, yet vaguely a part of your memory.

Tapes are scattered around.

You must rewind the tapes to learn about a mysterious presence.

If you hear static, it's too late.

Controls:

WASD to move.

R to rewind tapes next to the cassette player.

Made in one week for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

Written in C using raylib.

Theme was Rewind.
